title: So now that the maximum Premades are 3 in dia+ how can we practise teamranked in Dia/Master/Chall ?
body:
- You removed 5v5 ranked
- You removed the alternative option to play 5v5 in "Solo/Dynamic-Queue" 

the only thing we can do now is playing normals against silver players which doesn't help our training at all.

must be hard admitting your mistakes and give us back teamranked 5v5.

replies.body: semi-pro is fucked
This is why these boards are stupid. The same people were complaining in the beginning that in DQ 5 man LCS teams were ruining the challenger scene becasue they couldn't compete.

> [{quoted}](name=YCitizenSnipsY,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ai3hFgY1,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-06-04T18:27:50.886+0000)
>
> This is why these boards are stupid. The same people were complaining in the beginning that in DQ 5 man LCS teams were ruining the challenger scene becasue they couldn't compete.

Except the problem has not changed.

The fundamental issue which has been 100% consistent is that you cannot mix organized teams with 5 randoms and expect proper results. That is why we had a queue for solo and a queue for 5v5.  These are all symptoms of the cancer known as Dynamic Queue.

The 5 v5 was a fucking joke lol. There hasn't been a legit challenger team to make it to the NALCS in years. They are always full of ex pros and imports. The old system was no better for challenger teams that couldn't afford better players and to pretend otherwise is stupid.

What's your point?

Problem B does not mean Problem A (Dynamic queue) does not exist. You don't stop feeling pain from a broken leg because you have an abscessed tooth.
Well that last sentence isn't exactly very accurate
same people? are you talking about me? cause i hell never complained about this i don't care about lcs teams ruining challenger.

I've seen you post before and you circle jerk every popular opinion, so I'm sure you have posted this before when it was complained about. 

Either way I don't know why you even brought up Semi pro, like it was ever in good shape. If you don't have ex pros or imported players from other regions you aren't going to the NALCS anyway.
what the fuck? i never did it to challeneger, i don't care about what's happening there.

Just go play against silvers and have fun then?

If that isn't your thing and you want to go pro for C9 then go play premade games against teams in LCS.
thats not training

> If that isn't your thing and you want to go pro for C9 then go play premade games against teams in LCS.

You can't do a premade of 5 in Diamond+ now, so where do you propose these teams go to play against C9?

> [{quoted}](name=DrCyanide,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ai3hFgY1,comment-id=00000004,timestamp=2016-06-04T16:49:41.125+0000)
>
> You can't do a premade of 5 in Diamond+ now, so where do you propose these teams go to play against C9?

Dude, it's literally a game. If you take it so serious that you complain about being unable to premade in high tier, you should be taking the game a bit more serious than you currently are.

I'm not taking it seriously, I'm one of those guys that is completely fine with Dynamic Queue.

Riot, however, does take it seriously. They've built their entire E-sports scene around 5v5 teams, but has now stopped providing support for the 5v5 teams that they need to continue their E-sports. It's a problem they haven't announced a solution for, and one that they'll need a solution for soon.

> [{quoted}](name=DrCyanide,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ai3hFgY1,comment-id=0000000400000000,timestamp=2016-06-04T17:00:41.601+0000)
>
> I'm not taking it seriously, I'm one of those guys that is completely fine with Dynamic Queue.
> 
> Riot, however, does take it seriously. They've built their entire E-sports scene around 5v5 teams, but has now stopped providing support for the 5v5 teams that they need to continue their E-sports. It's a problem they haven't announced a solution for, and one that they'll need a solution for soon.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-611-notes

Because they are not a very fast company. I feel like Riot has good intentions for us players, but they have to avoid legality issues. That's honestly how I feel about Riot as a company, especially since I was in for this latest patch. I noticed they said, for Lucian, that they changed how we visualize his beam size. This is clearly wrong, they changed the range on his crazy poke instead of directly confronting the problem. They didn't want the average player to see that they effed up on his Q when they originally made him, and last updated him. This is evident because we can clearly see they do these sorts of stunts all the time. They don't want to see us seeing them slip, or it could be detrimental to their company growth aka they can get sued because they changed a champion that someone spent cold hard RP and money on.

> [{quoted}](name=cogsnter04,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ai3hFgY1,comment-id=00000004000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-05T04:23:45.321+0000)

They didn't want the average player to see that they effed up on his Q when they originally made him, and last updated him. This is evident because we can clearly see they do these sorts of stunts all the time. They don't want to see us seeing them slip, or it could be detrimental to their company growth aka they can get sued because they changed a champion that someone spent cold hard RP and money on.

What in the utter fuck are you talking about. There is an agreement when you make an account, and every patch. You dont own the stuff you spend RP on. You agree that you understand it can be changed at any time and you have no complaint coming because you agreed.

You can buy every champion in the game with RP and they can hotfix them all tomorrow in a way you dont like and you just get to say "Oh, darn, with they hadnt done that..." and thats it.

I agree that they arrogantly fuck up the champs with needless buffs/changes (Xin) and wont revert mistakes because they dont want to look like theyre throwing darts, but it inst some legal maneuvering.

> [{quoted}](name=Weasel Kensei,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ai3hFgY1,comment-id=000000040000000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-05T09:36:24.952+0000)

Just some little things they do that you don't pick up on, Karma main.
http://www.lolskill.net/summoner/NA/cogsnter04/summary i dont add anymore words

> [{quoted}](name=Xokurish,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ai3hFgY1,comment-id=00000003,timestamp=2016-06-04T02:09:43.898+0000)
>
> http://www.lolskill.net/summoner/NA/cogsnter04/summary i dont add anymore words

What about my page? Nothing wrong with being in low rank, just means you are newer to the game. I have played for 2 months, and I have a small champion pool.
Being low elo doesn't necessarily mean you're new to the game I've seen people play longer than I have and still be in bronze/silver.

> [{quoted}](name=cogsnter04,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ai3hFgY1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-03T20:12:01.912+0000)
>

> 
> If that isn't your thing and you want to go pro for C9 then go play premade games against teams in LCS.

This. This right here. This is the kind of person that makes Riot think they are doing a good job. Stop patronizing us and stop being a sheep. If you honestly can't see the obvious issue here then I'm not sure how you managed to download the game in the first place without inadvertently setting off nuclear launches.
technically, you are the sheep in this situation.

> [{quoted}](name=macromite,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ai3hFgY1,comment-id=000000020001,timestamp=2016-06-04T15:34:16.231+0000)
>
> technically, you are the sheep in this situation.

How so? I'm thinking for myself and not conforming to what Riot wants me to think...also let's be completely real, the majority of LoL players (which is very clearly not represented in forums) either like DQ or simply do not care one way or the other.
you are conforming to the masses, following along a bunch of strings without adding your own spin. that is how a sheep is defined, at least with the definition that I was taught.

> [{quoted}](name=macromite,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ai3hFgY1,comment-id=00000002000100000000,timestamp=2016-06-04T22:57:02.224+0000)
>
> you are conforming to the masses, following along a bunch of strings without adding your own spin. that is how a sheep is defined, at least with the definition that I was taught.

A sheep is actually defined as a mammal of the Ovis genus that is generally domesticated for its wool. Perhaps don't use that term "defined" so lightly. More importantly however, people that are agasint DQ are in the minority. Perhaps not in these forums, but in the general LoL community, DQ supporters/neutrals make up the VAST majority. So to call me a sheep in the figurative sense is simply misinformed.
you know, you that sheep definition doesn't help you at all. anyway, I'm done talking to someone that doesn't understand how implications and connotations work.

> [{quoted}](name=macromite,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ai3hFgY1,comment-id=0000000200010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-05T01:29:05.937+0000)

> [{quoted}](name=cogsnter04,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ai3hFgY1,comment-id=000000020000,timestamp=2016-06-04T14:15:28.309+0000)
>

But this is the fkin problem. The game is NOT fun anymore. And I am not so unique in this opinion. Just look at the pros who are leaving the public servers in favor of their own soloQ system on the tournament realm. It's too bad us plebs in plat and lower don't have the same escape...
Except that pro players are leaving to the Tournament Realm :^)
only logical answer is smurf five team
you dont get the point
I believe i do, i'm being sarcastic.... of course you didn't appear to have noticed though. The answer is nothing, op is completely correct.
although i could tell you were, better be safe and put something like /S or kappa after your sarcasm because it isn't always that obvious through typing

i don't get the point of dq above diamond, none care about playing with their friends there. they were supposed to help low elo playing ranked by letting them playing with their friends, diamonds have nothing to do with this story


easy solution: remove dq from diamond and above, and give us back ranked 5v5+solo Q. that's the least of what they can do if they don't want to bring it back for every elo

> [{quoted}](name=playfive Koopska,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ai3hFgY1,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-06-03T20:21:11.983+0000)

That would be so unfair :/
It is already unfair riot just slapped everyone below diamond
They clearly said they might re-enable 5v5 for high MMR. So you are already whining at what they said they'd do.

They also said they are thinking about bringing back soloq.

I guess some of us don't learn how to translate riot speak

> [{quoted}](name=LearningTheGame,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ai3hFgY1,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-06-03T22:51:38.367+0000)
>
> They also said they are thinking about bringing back soloq.
> 
> I guess some of us don't learn how to translate riot speak

um no they didnt
They said they are looking into opening up 5man premades during peak hours.
Its called Custom match. Scrim 5v5. In the Gold tournament we had none of us did ranked. We did custom 5s vs another team
Because people are gonna be able to consistently 5v5 Scrim as often as they could 5v5 ranked.

Because challenger and master team ranked is exactly the same as a prescheduled gold tournament.

Thanks for your input!! HHAHAHa

Assuming that's the correct choice, where is Riot's list of 5 man teams at that level? 

They're going to need to draw on it for the Challenger Series anyway, so they need to have something official in place.

Community literally has attention span of a rodent. 

"hey fuck rto premades are fkin up diamond and master and challneged please remiove"
"...hey, where did our premades go??!?"

No they do not, the issue is neither of these things can co exist within the same queue/ladder system, riot could have gone the route of making solo queue true solo while removing all of the artificial frustration points of 5v5 gamemode and add in a team search functionality to help support it.

They chose to do neither and just said well screw it lets just shove them all into a single queue what can go wrong?

I guess you will have to do the same thing the pros are doing: 
switch to custom games and build your own, custom ladder.
Scrim like all other high level gaming teams do.
